summary: This bill, the HUD-USDA-VA Interagency Coordination Act, mandates collaboration between the Departments of Housing and Urban Development (HUD), Agriculture (USDA), and Veterans Affairs (VA). It requires these agencies to establish an interagency agreement to share housing-related research and market data. Furthermore, the bill mandates a joint report to Congress, outlining opportunities to improve efficiencies in housing programs. This report must be published in the Federal Register for public comment before submission to relevant congressional committees.
